If you're looking for a movie with an intriguing plot twist, 'Paycheck' might be a good choice. Starring Ryan Robbins and featuring Joe Morton, the film follows an engineer whose memory is erased after completing a top-secret project.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a family-friendly adventure, 'The Goonies' could bring back nostalgic feels. With a star-studded cast that includes Josh Brolin, Steve Antin, and Corey Feldman, the movie follows a group of misfit kids who embark on an epic treasure hunt.
